actions.abilityText:
When the enemy monster performs a switch action, discard this aura.

When all time counters are removed from this, next turn your opponent must reveal their selected action before you select yours.
If this attack is buffed, this attack gains pierce.~PIERCE~
This attack gains [FLIP] [FLIP] when this monster has a deadlock counter on it.

buffs.buffText: This monster gains {"stat": "ATK", "num": 3, "isPositive": true} if the opponent selected a switch action this turn.
buffs.flipEventText: The enemy monster suffers 1[ATK] and this monster heals 1[HP].

buffs.buffText: This monster gains {"stat": "SPD", "num": 4, "isPositive": true} if the opponent selected a switch action this turn.

Super
Attack speeds are reversed this turn and you win all speed ties.~SUPER~
buffs.flipEventText: If this attack is slower, this attack gains +2[ATK].~SLOWER~

buffs.buffText:
Super
If the enemy monster is weak to this attack's element, this attack gains
+4[ATK].
~SUPER~~EFFECTIVE~
buffs.flipEventText:
If the enemy monster is weak to this attack's element, this attack gains
+2[ATK].

abilityText:
At the start of the turn, put a deadlock counter on this monster if it doesn't already have one. If it does, remove the deadlock counter instead.

While this monster has a deadlock counter on it, the enemy monster cannot perform switch actions.
